title: Champions that need nerfs
body: I want people to forget this page ever existed because at the time of posting it I was a pleb, but I get now that the champs I called unbalanced, I was just playing against wrong. Still give kat a resource though, I don't think she should be able to just spam incessantly. ( personal opinion, and yours are respected as well)

replies.body: Darius was a special case, because he's not technically op, there are just a couple things that in my own opinion, could be changed for the better. Just an opinion of mine, and no opinion is the correct opinion, and I respect yours equally.
all these champs are fine how they are lol ekko needs a fucking nerf

I agree with half that statement, because yes ekko does need a good nerf on certain things, but some of the champs I mentioned, have in my experience, all been very hard to play against in some form, and ekko would be on the bottom of the list. I just think Katarina would be better suited with a mana bar, and that the other champs I mentioned could do with certain nerfs, but I do respect your opinion and thank you for your feedback.
